bibl.title: When did the Trojans turn into Phrygians? Alcaeus 42.15.
bibl.note: Fr. 42,15. It is possible to find a reading which removes the Phrygians from Alcaeus' poem: "oi d'apolont' amph' E[lenai damentes" or "pathontes" or "kakista".
bibl.seg: Hall Edith, When did the Trojans turn into Phrygians? Alcaeus 42.15.
Fr. 42,15. It is possible to find a reading which removes the Phrygians from Alcaeus' poem: "oi d'apolont' amph' E[lenai damentes" or "pathontes" or "kakista".
